column4: Hi, Would I be fortunate enough to find a linuxcoin expert here or ubuntu/debian?
Guys, I have an issue where my ubuntu machine keeps switching itself off! Can you someone point me to where I can check logs for the possible reason?
try dmesg - depending what the problem is, you may not see anything useful
vega- It's one of four servers and I think the issue may be related to power draw. Was hoping I could find a reason in the logs. How would I search for such a thing txm within dmesg?
